## ThirdwebSDK.getTokenDrop() method

Get an instance of a Token Drop contract

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTokenDrop(address: string): TokenDrop;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                          |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| address   | string | the address of the deployed contract |

**Returns:**

TokenDrop

the contract
